name: Tavan
slogan: Data-driven route builder for runners & cyclists
description: Tavan is for the 150M+ runners/cyclists in the world. We initially launched with a weather-based clothing recommendation engine. Then we decided to pivot into route-building. Our data-driven route builder uses aggregated and anonymized activity data from athletes to generate the best route alternatives for other athletes. We're revolutionizing how athletes discover their surroundings. We have a culture that is very supportive of endurance training and sports.

team.name: Mert Salur
team.bioHtml: Founder of Tavan. Co-Founder of Getir, the fastest mobile retail app in the world. Co-Founder of BiTaksi, Turkey's leading taxi-hailing app.

jobs.title: CTO & Co-Founder
jobs.description:
Develop technology and people.

* Be full-stack. You don't have to be an expert in everything, as long as you have the confidence that you can learn and execute when necessary.
* Recruit, retain, and develop awesome people. But in the early days, do as much as you can individually. Then recruit, delegate, manage, yet know the whole picture.
* Be the Founder's liasion to the entire tech-development process. Explain like you'll explain to a five year old when necessary.
* Do not limit yourself to simpliy technology. You'll be a Co-Founder and thus you'll have an important say.
* Call the Founder out when you think they're wrong. Disagree and commit to the vision when needed.
* Be decent and fun. Why go on a collective journey if it's not going to be enjoyable on a human-to-human level?

(current) tech stack: Node.js, MongoDB, React Native, Python, RabbitMQ, AWS, Google Cloud.
